text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Well you just put a nail in @DanForestNC election campaign coffin

Sorry, shouldn't have mentioned coffins around you. You don't seem to comprehend that they carry a dead body. Could be from an attack in Afghanistan that your pal paid for, perhaps died from COVID-19
